بعد ١٥ سنة من تفوقنا التكنولوجي في مصر، ولإننا حابين نقدم خدمات كتيرة عالية الجودة لكل عملائنا، جه الوقت إللي نطور في “اتصالات من &e في مصر” وندخل المستقبل الرقمي من أوسع الأبواب! شبكتنا النهاردة بتغطي ۹۹% من مناطق مصر، وبنطور يوم ورا يوم عشان نوصل رسالتنا بالنمو والتحول والتفوق، كل دا عشان نوفر لعملائنا أفضل تجربة رقمية، ونسرع العملية التشغيلية. النهاردة في “اتصالات من &e في مصر” إحنا جاهزين نقدملكم خدمات رقمية جديدة تسهلكو حياتكم اليومية، ومع خدمة المكالمات التقليدية، حنوفرلكم خدمات تانية كتير! لإننا بجد شريكم الموثوق، إللي بيخليكم على تواصل، وبياخدكم للمستقبل عبر تسريع الاقتصاد الرقمي والريادة.
مع “اتصالات من &e في مصر” حنبدأ مع بعض عصر جديد، ونقربكم من بعض عبر القارات، ومع بعض حنكتشف إمكانيات بكرة اللامحدودة من النهاردة.
“اتصالات من &e في مصر” ... معانا

The device combines the functionalities of satellite receiver, the media center capabilities of a PC and the interactivity of the internet in one easy to use device.

Connectme TV media hub incorporates an integrated advanced HD satellite receiver with an intuitive and powerful interface. With access to an advanced Electronic Program Guide (EPG) complete with information on upcoming TV programs, viewers can schedule future show recordings, and pause and rewind live TV broadcasts. The device allows users to download media from their home network or the internet. With Connectme TV advanced parental control features, parents will never have to worry about leaving their kids alone in front of the TV.

Moreover, Connectme TV’s interactive services integrate TV content delivered to the subscriber using existing satellite channels with interactive services delivered over IP allowing service providers to leverage their existing infrastructure and offer their subscribers services that include video on demand, media downloads and targeted advertisements and interactive advertisements.
Connectme TV… “Never Stay Home Without It.”

Our products deliver what we believe is an industry-leading combination of performance and monolithic integration, and target a broad range of applications serving consumers electronics, HIDs, smart meters, industrial mobile wireless devices, and generally wireless markets.

Vodafone,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGAjVTnzEmlYQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1625476544834?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=GRpVWUFETGQlVubvadBbUccFh_AIgpr8WWEVjz5InqY,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E1BAQHKSSZrVqbUGA/company-background_10000/0/1650972589411?e=1683860400&v=beta&t=d2dvyRY7DOcj7J8TTg_FBfhdOSaxZB6Hi456k0r_mlo,"At Vodafone, we are known for our technology, but the truth is, it is humanity that drives our business forward. With the global pandemic raising so many questions for tech brands, it has highlighted the leading role that we need to play.
We believe that, when working together, humanity and technology can find the answers and create a better future for all.

Working at Vodafone is all about helping people feel ready to benefit from new technology. We bring the future to even the most remote places, using technology to help families in disaster zones, showing young people that a phone is not just for fun and thinking about technology that doesn’t even exist yet.

More than 35 years ago, we made the first-ever mobile phone call, we sent the first SMS in Britain and have been changing the lives of billions of people ever since. Now, we are using smartphones to fight cancer, big data for social good, and we aim to connect over 250 million people to our next generation networks by 2025.

INJAZ Egypt,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFLR3JWP9yqWg/company-logo_200_200/0/1648638065668?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=bY-0UZBlF8kt4WhH9-p7azBMJSCtmo5gQdGQi2jj6-E,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E1BAQHlzTDibbxvEw/company-background_10000/0/1650268632153?e=1683864000&v=beta&t=OMXSpVebr1IxgxNYf8TOMUMxUOHVB0oDX1QHg17qYE0,"INJAZ Egypt delivers experiential learning in financial literacy, work readiness and entrepreneurship, effectively enriching the ability of young Egyptians to both engage in their own economic development and contribute to the strength of their communities and economies.

INJAZ has been working in Egypt for more than a decade to promote the skills of employability and entrepreneurship among Egypt’s unemployed youth. Partnering with business and educational institutions, INJAZ supplements public school curricula with programs designed to build the capacity and realize the potential of students and young graduates.

INJAZ Egypt is a member nation of more than 100-country Junior Achievement (JA) network; the world’s largest and fastest growing organization specializing in economic education, powered by over 450,000 volunteers and mentors from all sectors of society, reaching more than 10 million young people around the world every year.

INJAZ Egypt is also part of the regional network INJAZ Al-Arab, which harnesses the mentorship of Arab business leaders to help inspire a culture of entrepreneurialism and business innovation among Arab youth throughout 14 countries in the MENA region.
عن مؤسسة انجاز مصر

تقوم مؤسسة «إنجاز مصر» بتقديم فرص التعليم التشاركي في مجال الثقافة المالية والاستعدادية للعمل وريادة الأعمال، مما يؤثر بدوره تأثيراً إيجابياً فعالا في قدرة الشباب على  الإنخراط في تحقيق نموهم  الإقتصادي، والمساهمة في تعزيز مجتمعاتهم وإقتصادياتهم.

ولقد قامت مؤسسة «إنجاز مصر» بممارسة نشاطها لفترة تجاوزت أكثر من عشرة أعوام، بهدف دعم مهارات التوظيف وريادة ا عمال بين شباب مصر الذين يعانون من مشكلة البطالة المزمنة، وذلك عن طريق الشراكة مع المؤسسات التعليمية ومؤسسات  الأعمال في جميع أنحاء البلا د. كما تقوم «إنجاز مصر» بتزويد مناهج المدارس ببعض البرامج التي تم تصميمها خصيصاً لبناء القدرات وتحقيق إمكانيات الطلاب وشباب الخريجين.

تمثل مؤسسة «إنجاز مصر» العضو  الاكبر في الشبكة  الإقليمية «إنجاز العرب» التي تقوم بإرشاد قادة رجال وسيدات أعمال العرب بشأن تحفيز ثقافة ريادة الأعمال والإبتكار لدى الشباب العربي في 14 دولة في منطقة الشرق الأوسط وشمال أفريقيا، والتي تعتبر المركز الإقليمي لمؤسسة «جونيور أتشيفمنت العالمية »  Junior Achievement Worldwide بصفتها أكبر مؤسسة متخصصة في التعليم الإقتصادي في العالم وأكثرها نمواً.
كما يغطي العمل في شبكة «جونيور أتشيفمنت العالمية» اكثر من 100 دولة، مدعومة من اكثر من 450,000  متطوع ومستشار قادمين من مختلف قطاعات المجتمع، وتصل خدماتها إلى أكثر من 10 مليون طالب.

Digital Egypt Builders Initiative- DEBI,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGEQJRlK_XxlQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1604510003894?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=jYZTbt6geHh6lAzkdDK00f4Zn2c12z8ocde6Ic9oiSE,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D1BAQHKAvshEBto0g/company-background_10000/0/1657371788186?e=1683864000&v=beta&t=Wn1XDNhM6BWhCOkFmatnGqRxGkivr2iWgeoYuLM_uwA,"DEBI is a unique initiative that was launched by the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT) and announced in the presence of the President of Egypt in September 2020. The initiative falls under the pillar “Egyptian Human Development”, a key pillar of MCIT strategy for building Digital Egypt.

The initiative seeks to empower the next generation of Egyptian young graduates of engineering and computer science colleges to become leaders at the global level and be capable of implementing Egypt’s digital vision.

The initiative offers, annually, a free scholarship to 1,000 top graduate students from engineering and computer science colleges; they will be selected according to specific conditions and admission criteria to be prepared as young cadres in various fields, including data science, artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, robotics, automation and digital arts. In addition, they will be assigned to a training program on leadership and management skills.

DEBI is implemented in cooperation with a number of major international universities, specializing in new technology fields, and local and global companies, working in the fields of ICT or in development of leadership or language skills; those global universities grant technical Master’s degree in the field of ICT or a professional Master’s degree according to the certificate provided by the university. As for companies, they will conduct workshops in different technology areas, contribute to enriching the educational process and provide training programs to develop students’ skills and grant them approved certificates once their training is completed. Each student also receives a certificate in leadership and management skills and an English proficiency certificate from specialized global companies.

After the termination of the scholarship and completion of graduation projects students will be highly qualified to work in digital transformation projects, to support building Digital Egypt.",,6340.0,http://www.debi.gov.eg,debi.gov.eg,,,15388,Education Administration Programs,11-50 employees,,2020.0,69204627.0,69204627,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/69204627/,60.0,Digital Egypt Builders Initiative- DEBI,https://www.linkedin.com/company/69204627/,2023-05-05T03:14:03.810Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/digital-egypt-builders-initiative-debi/,,,

Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHGj_y86Ge_ow/company-logo_200_200/0/1519874249310?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=4CrJV-vwL5kDceRJlhLTqUvcggKsn-asDJWBnQju0U4,,"Ain Shams University was established in 1950 under the name of Ibrahim Pasha University. It was the third university in Egypt after Fouad I University and Farouk I University (Cairo and Alexandria Universities). After the 1952 revolution, it was thought that it would be more appropriate to assign the university a name, Heliopolis “the city of the sun” that would be a permanent reminder of the oldest Egyptian University in history that was very famous in science and astronomy in the pharaonic era. In November 1952, the historical Zaafran palace was chosen to be the university headquarters. The palace was surrounded by 100 acres of green area. It was established during the period of Ismail Pasha. The Egyptian–English treaty was signed there in 1936. In 1954, at the recommendation of the university council, a law was passed changing the name to the “University of Ain Shams”. During the last few years, the palace was renovated to maintain its original architectural as well as artistic features. Throughout its history, the university has always been in continuous development. Its graduates are highly distinguished in the employment market. The university includes the following faculties and institutes: Faculty of Arts, Faculty of Law, Faculty of Commerce, Faculty of Science, Faculty of Engineering, Faculty of Medicine, Faculty of Agriculture, Faculty of Education, Faculty of Women for Arts, Science and Education, Faculty of Languages (Al–Alsun), Faculty of Dentistry, Faculty of Pharmacy, Faculty of Computer Science and Information, Faculty of Nursing, Institute of Environmental Studies and Research and Institute of Postgraduate Childhood Studies.",,102604.0,http://eng.shams.edu.eg,eng.shams.edu.eg,,EG,,Education Administration Programs,"501-1,000 employees",,,653005.0,653005,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/653005/,1651.0,"Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University",https://www.linkedin.com/company/653005/,2023-05-05T03:14:50.661Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/faculty-of-engineering-ain-shams-university/,,,

National Bank of Egypt (NBE),https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQG_mdP0FDictA/company-logo_200_200/0/1570534523250?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=cXSperPtVUPwQh7cFsOEPQMexhkGCTyOEftwL2Ze3Kw,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D1BAQHWPRYHZuQ9Pw/company-background_10000/0/1682928315861?e=1683864000&v=beta&t=pQn-F9cMt-dJy8kmX6IH3xcOIWtmQwQ8z8FFkX08-ec,"Since its inception in 1898 with a capital of GBP1 million, NBE has been regarded as one of the oldest and most respected commercial banks in Egypt.Never isolated from national issues or concerns, NBE has been the primary supporter of Egypt’s national economy by financing the major Egyptian national projects.

NBE’s missions and operations have continuously evolved throughout history and the economic and political changes experienced by the country.NBE was entrusted with issuing banknotes and handling government accounts, then in the 1950’s its activities evolved to undertaking the duties of the Central Bank. In the 1960’s it focused on commercial banking while still handling the central banking duties in locations where the Central Bank had no branches. Eventually, issuing and managing Investment Certificates for the State.NBE currently controls 23.6% of the market share of total assets in the Egyptian banking sector, 25.8% of total deposits, and 21.8% of total loans.

Scope Group,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQFUZ9JB-QBllA/company-logo_200_200/0/1519912223229?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=bK29mAt7n1XYpW542q1WZ0VgGw0DJEu3oczUmYGpS4I,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D1BAQFp_EsNFtuvNg/company-background_10000/0/1543568198818?e=1683864000&v=beta&t=rrZwT9Myx-YhkSbyuwCV9vdqtlILMMqhtxdj1io8dOY,"Scope is the leading European provider of credit ratings, fund analysis, ESG assessment and bespoke solutions for evaluating and monitoring risk. Scope provides an essential alternative perspective on credit and ESG risk and in doing so contributes to a more diverse and balanced ratings industry. The group has approximately 300 employees across offices in Berlin, Frankfurt, London, Madrid, Milan, Oslo and Paris.

As the leading European credit rating agency, Scope Ratings offers clients opinion-driven, forward-looking and non-mechanistic credit risk analysis and contributes to greater diversity of credit opinions for institutional investors. Founded in 2012, Scope Ratings differs from other agencies’ traditional one-size-fits-all top-down methodologies. The agency recognises the importance of national and regional differences in laws, regulations, political processes and business culture across Europe.
Scope Ratings is registered in accordance with EU rating regulations and operates in the European Union with ECAI status. Scope is also registered with the Swiss authority FINMA.

Today, Scope Analysis is Europe's leading valuation company for the analysis and rating of mutual funds, alternative investment funds, asset management companies and certificate issuers. Scope Analysis offers opinion-driven and forward-looking risk-return research and risk monitoring.
Scope Risk Solutions connects the deep analytical knowhow of Scope Ratings with a sophisticated credit risk management service.

Scope Investors Services focuses on researching and structuring individual solutions across the Group to provide comprehensive support to investors in the increasingly heterogeneous requirements of portfolio and risk management.
Data protection policy: https://www.scopegroup.com/#/privacy-policy

The creative spirit of our international team has been another primary force. This has led us to evolve from offering classic software consulting services to creating our own, in-house ground-breaking IoT solutions that cover hardware and electronics in addition to software.

Our main creation is EASY Shopper, an intelligent shopping cart that brings the future to the here and now. This is just one of the results of our drive to push technological boundaries, with the customer convenience as the main emphasis.
**Pentland Firth awarded as a Great Place To Work**
We are a great place to work and we have proof!
On May 5th, 2021 we were awarded the ninth place in the Great Place to Work competition ""Deutschlands Beste Arbeitgeber 2021"" (category with 50-100 employees)!

Furthermore, we were also awarded the sixth place in the competition ""Beste Arbeitgeber in der ITK 2021"" (category with 50-100 employees). This means that, for the seventh year in a row, we are among the top 10 tech companies in Germany!
Furthermore, we were also awarded the seventh place in the Great Place To Work competition ""Bayerns Beste Arbeitgeber 2021""​ (category with 50-250 employees).
The results of these independent, anonymous employee surveys confirm that we truly are a place where people enjoy working and yet are challenged to constantly further themselves.
We are very proud of this success!

General Information

In September 1999, Egypt launched the National Program to develop the Communications and Information Technology (ICT) sector in Egypt. The program aims to foster the development of an information society in Egypt and stimulate the growth of a strong, competitive, vibrant, export-oriented ICT sector. The cornerstone of this program was the establishment of the new Ministry of Communications and Information Technology, in October 1999, to lead these efforts.

Then, the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT) launched a National Plan for ICT, establishing multi-disciplinary projects and initiatives related to vital sectors, such as education and health. The national plan helps the ministry promote the use of ICT nationwide as a means to achieve national development goals; and establish the pillars of a knowledge society in Egypt in close collaboration with other governmental, civil society and private sector entities.",MCIT is the government body responsible for information and communications technology (ICT) issues in the Arab Republic ,127019.0,http://www.mcit.gov.eg,mcit.gov.eg,,US,,Telecommunications,"1,001-5,000 employees",,1999.0,118142.0,118142,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/118142/,1530.0,"Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT), Egypt",https://www.linkedin.com/company/118142/,2023-05-05T03:37:46.788Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/ministry-of-communications-and-information-technology/,وزارة الاتصالات وتكنولوجيا المعلومات- مصر,,

Abu Dhabi Executive Office (ADEO) is an executive supervisory body in Abu Dhabi Government. The Office, which is chaired by H.H. Sheikh Khaled bin Mohamed Bin Zayed is responsible for monitoring and following-up on the settings and implementation of the strategic and executive plans carried out by local entities, as well as, assessing their performance. Moreover, ADEO is entrusted for overseeing and contributing in laying down of the Emirate’s strategic and executive plans, foreseeing future opportunities and challenges in all aspects being strategic, operational, administrative, financial, scientific, as well as, in governance and ensure its rightful implementation adjustment.

Through secure audio-visual communication links between teachers and students, we offer education without borders, allowing students to achieve optimal success in both academics and life.
NajahNow – najah in Arabic means “success” – accepts only the most highly-qualified faculty and seriously motivated students. Many of our instructors are retired top professionals in their fields.

bld.ai,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGgFkbUnb1dOA/company-logo_200_200/0/1641435552042?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=3BOk8OeRPnKxf6dE8x6CtnPE1C0GzS5DGaU7d8m5JfY,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C561BAQE0fkO07fgW-w/company-background_10000/0/1641435481476?e=1683864000&v=beta&t=5y61Lmp9uBdIBdMdTVZoog_ApzNQ0JL0VEYVE9MJIpg,"About bld.ai
Our mission is to create meaningful jobs for millions of people, by teaching them how to build human-centered AI products.
Our Philosophy

In the age of software, innovative organizations invest significantly to build their own proprietary digital products that offer a great User Experience (UX) and leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI).

This omnipresent AI software layer opens a new dimension where operations, products and services merge into one user experience. Whether the user is an employee, another business, or a customer, the cost, speed, and ease of utilizing the AI layer becomes the most important differentiators between winners and losers in globally competitive marketplaces.

Off the shelf software does not differentiate you, nor does it provide the integration, flexibility, and affordability you need to succeed. In the age of software, we believe the only way to win is through bespoke digital products where you own the IP and have the ability to prioritize new features.
However, building teams that build AI with great UX is incredibly hard. Our value proposition is that we provide you with teams that will design, build, support and maintain those products.
Why choose bld.ai

Experience. Our team has been building AI software with great UX for 20 years. We have both the academic and practical experience required to manage expectations and focus on the important parts of building machine learning engines successfully.

Speed. We deploy nimble teams of 3-7 people to quickly build tools, deploy features and improve functionality. Most importantly, our teams have worked together in the past and operate as full stack, end-to-end squads.

IP Ownership. All the IP we create is the sole property of those we serve. We build it from the ground up working hand-in-hand with you. Bespoke software is less expensive and provides better integration and scale.","Let’s design, build, and maintain human-centered AI products together.",6756.0,https://bld.ai,https://bld.ai,Boca Raton,"Boca Raton, FL 33496, US",,Internet Publishing,201-500 employees,"Boca Raton, FL",2017.0,13653729.0,13653729,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/13653729/,225.0,bld.ai,https://www.linkedin.com/company/13653729/,2023-05-05T03:56:34.988Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/bldai/,"UI design, UX design, Data Science, AI, Software Development, and Product Management",,

Zartis is a digital solutions provider and Deloitte Fast50 company working across technology consulting, team augmentation and product development.

We know good code. And we know tech outsourcing, which can be risky when you don't know who to trust. Deep technical experience and hard-earned know-how are our secret ingredients to help you build game-changing software technology, while avoiding unnecessary time and budget-wasting engineering shortfalls.
We pride ourselves on the expertise of our engineers and the quality of the work we deliver. We are a diverse company, with team members drawn from over thirty different nationalities.
WHAT WE DO:

Zartis partners with firms across financial services, medtech, media, logistics technology, renewable energy, edtech, e-commerce,  and more. Our teams of talented engineers are based across EMEA and LATAM and focus on delivering business success and digital improvement across application development, software architecture, DevOps and CI/CD, business intelligence, QA automation and technology integrations.
OUR EXPERTISE:

Children's Cancer Hospital Foundation 57357,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH7jmXWQWv7kQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1554054787621?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=WnwIYjOMCmpXbfkiDXuYMEoXeDZmeULlyILIusIdK3U,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C561BAQHY8mGvXIMsBQ/company-background_10000/0/1554054948674?e=1683867600&v=beta&t=gv6-tu8rJ7mFHX7UO8x_hYRZ3v8_mo_M837Ksu-yZxw,"The Children’s Cancer Hospital Egypt 57357(CCHE) widely known as Hospital 57357 is a unique healthcare institution and an ultimate example of what can be achieved when people work together for a common goal. The people of Egypt and friends from all over the world and most particularly in the Arab World have contributed generously to the establishment of the hospital which has been completely built by donations. Egyptians from all walks of life rallied around the setting up of a state of the art pediatric oncology hospital to achieve the dream of a better tomorrow for their children with cancer.

Inspired by the model of the St. Jude Research Hospital in Memphis, Tennessee in the U.S, the Children’s Cancer Hospital Egypt 57357 (CCHE 57357) is the largest Hospital in the world in terms of capacity (320 beds). It was established in 2007 with the mission of providing the best comprehensive family centered quality care and a chance for cure to all children with cancer seeking its services, free of charge and without discrimination.

Initially, since the inception of the 57357 Project, the focus was on how to provide the best comprehensive quality care and an opportunity for cure. Sofitel Cairo Nile El Gezirah ,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHRBnTCr7idyQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1577704171868?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=9FZiFjGOROvjfcZuZVaT42VvjZ_NZiVLvEIf8Tdd_ms,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D1BAQGl-C_4cmP9fw/company-background_10000/0/1660296777473?e=1683867600&v=beta&t=ZunMeGJftb-kOKdW0DDUfYXMXFkiQrVGMFQ7zBs1-vc,"Right in the heart of the world’s oldest city, Sofitel Cairo El Gezirah stands proudly on  El Gezirah Island, offering panoramic views of the Nile. The sparkling, unmistakable tower is home to over 400 luxury rooms and suites, reflecting contemporary elegance with a blend of Pharaonic, Arabian and, of course, French art deco designs, courtesy of the world renowned Pierre-Yves Rochon. A family favorite, the hotel is walking distance from Cairo’s leafy, culture-infused Zamalek district, as well as the hustle and bustle of the Downtown area.
A Relaxing Retreat in the Heart of History

From the moment you arrive on El Gezirah Island, you’ll be whisked away to the heyday of Cairo’s opulence. Just a stone’s throw away from former royal palaces and gardens, Sofitel Cairo Nile El Gezirah is inspired by the district’s lushness.
Restaurants
Experience the ultimate dining experience and tickle your taste buds with a wide

Selection of Cairo’s best restaurants, all available in the hotel. A first choice for gourmet Travelers, the hotel offers everything from the Italian cuisine at Casa Mia restaurant, to a French-Japanese fusion at Le Deck by Laurent Peugeot, even offering a serene setting for an afternoon tea at Window on the Nile.
Meeting & Events

Notorious for offering premium business facilities, offering sophisticated venue for conferences, seminars, and corporate events. Equipped with seven state of the art meeting and event rooms, two of which are endowed with Nile terraces that have the capacity to hold between 20-600 guests, the hotel provides conveniences that boast Elegance and sophistication. Our Magnifique Meeting team promises flawless events, innovative ideas for team-building or leisure activities in Cairo, and classy catering for buffet dining, gourmet banquets, and unique coffee breaks.
Well-being & Spa
Our Sofitel Spa is the most luxurious of its kind and is a sanctuary of relaxation and well being.

Fusion Analytics,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEiMqiR100uCw/company-logo_200_200/0/1621538705938?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=sEIuC8elnoVek7lxhN9y3yAH7qMt4Du4yOHZbwT7C-g,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E1BAQEP9SS9HTtwGg/company-background_10000/0/1621538618236?e=1683867600&v=beta&t=D9BYV5iuGMWc_Pt_WHUAH4DGWB-7URmy943fx66cOYE,"Fusion is an advanced analytics firm specializing in Measuring and Prioritizing. We empower global retail leaders to make better decisions by fusing all sources of data into a clear view across the business.

For over 13 years, we have been helping our clients to better understand their business by consolidating complex insights into compelling stories, with distinct chapters and clear plotlines leading to epiphanies of “I know exactly what actions to take next” for our clients.

The Fusion MethodTM takes the bias and politics out of competing data sets. It provides the best customized analytics, advanced mathematically modeling, and speed to fuse multiple data sources from inside and outside the organization. With its ability to generate unique perspectives and drive clear actions, Fusion is the secret weapon for growing retailers, and is the only data analytics and advisory company that delivers One Version of The Truth across your enterprise.

We achieve all the above by mathematically fusing over 42 internal & external data sources and over 140 enterprise metrics measured across the organization via our proprietary AI model built off of Bayesian statistics. As a wholly different statistical paradigm from traditional methods, Bayesian statistics has been explored and validated for three centuries but has only recently become practical with advances in AI.
The Fusion Process:
- Uncover and remove all blind spots in the business
- Triangulate multiple data sources for each metric to remove noise and find
the actual signal
- Fuse/integrate all the metrics so you can see a clear picture of what is working and what is not
- Rack & stack the results into clear outlines so your team can prioritize
- Work with you to build an action plan, then implement and review

To learn more please visit: https://www.fusionanalytics.com or email info@fusionanalytics.com",We Help Global Retailers Gain Clarity Across Their Enterprise By Providing Actionable Insights Through The Fusion Method,1536.0,http://www.fusionanalytics.com,fusionanalytics.com,Toronto,"1670 Bayview Avenue, Suite 503, Toronto, ON M4G 3C2, CA",866 398 9927,Business Consulting and Services,51-200 employees,"Toronto, ON",2006.0,653113.0,653113,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/653113/,51.0,Fusion Analytics,https://www.linkedin.com/company/653113/,2023-05-05T04:25:47.484Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/fusion-retail-analytics/,"Strategic planning, Market-sizing & profit-sizing, Category management, Consumer & competitor trending, Margin & promo enhancement, Real estate planning, Inventory optimization, Marketing planning, Branding, Flyer planning & distribution, ROI, Tracking & Forecasting, Strategic Analytics, Retail Consulting, and Consumer Packaged Goods Consulting",,

Oslo politidistrikt,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHWGz5ja5T03w/company-logo_200_200/0/1616165220919?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=zWlWJbBDpJ6qrG6KENgqM8g_eSbYJWhid9WcQCWuEhw,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D1BAQF6v5NeK_HzyA/company-background_10000/0/1561559475551?e=1683867600&v=beta&t=pfg0ms_R8soTL765DZQ9Y5Qc8O-n34P6PP0NVU4JBlE,"Oslo politidistrikt er Norges største politidistrikt målt i innbyggertall, med en befolkning på rundt 911.970 mennesker. Det omfatter tre kommuner: Oslo, Asker og Bærum. I geografisk utstrekning er det derimot et lite politidistrikt, men har ansvar for en relativt stor del av den registrerte kriminaliteten i Norge.
Distriktet har ca. 3000 ansatte: 66,2% er politi, 5,3% er jurister og 26,4% er sivilt ansatte. Det gir Oslo politidistrikt en politidekning på 2,17 per 1000 innbygger.

Oslo politidistrikt har flere oppgaver av nasjonal karakter. Hovedstaden er både sete for Kongehus, Storting og regjering - det er også her departementene og hovedtyngden av direktoratene, og kultur- og finansinstitusjonene er plassert. I tillegg ligger Beredskapstroppen, Helikoptertjenesten, Bombegruppen og Krise- og gisselforhandlingsseksjonen til distriktet.
Reform 2015–2016

Som ledd i nærpolitireformen ble Oslo politidistrikt slått sammen med Asker og Bærum politidistrikt 1. januar 2016. Alle landets politidistrikter er i dag organisert likt (unntaket for Oslo er de nasjonale bistandsressursene):
- Felles enhet for operativ tjeneste
- Felles kriminalenhet
- Felles enhet for etterretning og etterforskning
- Felles enhet for forebygging
- Felles enhet for påtale
- Felles enhet for utlending og forvaltning
- Felles enhet for sivil rettspleie (namsfogd)
- Felles enhet for nasjonale bistandsressurser
- Enhet sentrum
Grønland politistasjon
Sentrum politistasjon
- Enhet vest
Asker politistasjon
Bærum politistasjon
Majorstuen politistasjon
- Enhet øst
Manglerud politistasjon
Stovner politistasjon

CUBE,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEltn1Hvkx2gQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1677750832141?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=Vg2EpZ3gvEZybslMwHJuV3pFZ9bhuVXW5bh5edX_Fdo,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E1BAQFRhn_eWRMLWA/company-background_10000/0/1677750681263?e=1683867600&v=beta&t=KJ_-I7enKorzfPCsjht0PQxTSGLFEbKx8iSskqZbPRI,"CUBE is a SaaS-based RegTech designed to take the complexity out of regulation using artificial intelligence and automation to deliver Automated Regulatory Intelligence (ARI).

Born out of the 2008 financial crisis, CUBE has become the world’s most comprehensive and robust source of classified, and meaningful AI-driven regulatory intelligence with 5,000 issuing bodies covering 180 jurisdictions and 60 languages.

We automate the capture of global regulatory data, alert you to regulatory changes that pose a compliance risk to your business, pinpoint all policies, procedures and controls that are affected, and enable rapid remediation. Over many years CUBE has built deep insight into the impact of regulatory change on financial services institutions, and we are uniquely positioned to ensure that you respond to global regulatory change in the most compliant way possible.

“The student and the factory”. They are the main factors of success. Equip the student with the solid knowledge and develop the factory by implementing industrial engineering improvement projects.
Vision: Egypt is a leading industrial Country.
Short Term Mission: Applying acquired knowledge and providing hands-on consultancy gaining instantaneous
Long Term Mission: Providing students through our programs with experience and knowledge that qualifies them to break into the labour market.
Target Market: Engineering students from various departments (mostly two departments of mechanical and electrical) and recently another Faculties Joined IDT: Pharmacy, Science and Applied Arts.

Values: Working to build generations capable of contributing to the development of industry and making Egypt a pioneer in all aspects of industry requires teamwork, consistency in self-improvement and community service.
IDT Main Events:

1- Consulting Event: IDT Consulting Projects has always been one of the most important events in IDT every year. Consulting department in IDT is a team of students who study industrial sciences all over the year and implement projects in factories in summer with what they have learned. They are leaded by an ex-consulting member in IDT, a student who has a real-life experience in a factory, who is trying to pass on the knowledge and the experience to the new generation.

2- Institute Event: Institute is our most popular event on campus, where ushering and selection of students with talents and high potential to progress and grow. They enter 24 - 18hours of Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Managerial Sessions, with a follow up project where the students can apply what they learned in the sessions.
3-Industrial Seminar: We provide talks in many Topics from Different fields providing Hands On Experience , how they evolve in their positions and how they Develop their skills.
4- Internship Fair: We provide at IDT Internships in the summer in different fields to fulfil the gap between university studies and the market needs taking its position as life changing Experience.

Achievements: IDT has been able to provide over 1,000 students with the essential information and training, which has totalled more than 500 hours over the years, and IDT youngsters have completed more than 20 projects in firms like as Nissan, LG, ABB, Schneider, Asfour Crystal, Oriental Weavers and many others. Harnessing technology, fueling innovation and fostering collaboration within the payment ecosystem, EBC provides more individuals and businesses domestically with an access to useful and affordable financial services and payment possibilities.

EBC is well positioned at the heart of the national payment system. With continued support by its shareholders, including the CBE and leading bank in EGYPT, EBC leverages every potential to accelerate adoption of electronic payment and fast track the national transformation into a cashless society.

Since 1995, EBC has been building, modernizing and operating domestic payment infrastructure.  And as it progresses into the third decade, it has emerged as the enabler of interoperable, flawless and secure payment experience across payment networks & schemes:

column2: 123 Shared Cash Network grants end user convenience of inter-bank transaction across 13k ATMs as well as regional and international networks.

ACH or Automated Clearing House is a nationwide electronic fund transfer system enabling inter-bank clearing of transactions in batches among financial institutions. The ACH system avails secure, fast and reliable fund transfer among bank accounts.

Meeza National Card Payment Scheme, launched in line with the directions of the National Payment Council to cater for consumer needs to a variety of convenient payment methods including cards and e-wallets supported with a wide spectrum of acceptance channels. Meeza Digital enables digital transfer of funds and purchase of goods or services instantly using mobile devices.

Swvl,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQHY5gFjt0jDWA/company-logo_200_200/0/1665491270375?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=rPWrkJwwFuh5iRLB3eovzkgnIPRglnvGRMADY9NArf4,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D1BAQEgVk1TotBjww/company-background_10000/0/1666079860284?e=1683871200&v=beta&t=XOXFtE6C_4X-Y0yJkh3fm6CGhxbaGZC90GEpSMdQGPc,"Swvl is a global provider of transformative tech-enabled mass transit solutions that enhance mass transit safety, reliability, and convenience in some of the world’s most challenging and complex emerging markets. Swvl is uniquely positioned to capitalize on the $1tn global mass transit market opportunity with daily commuting, inter-city travel, TaaS, and SaaS transportation solutions. Swvl currently operates in 115 cities in 18 countries across Latin America, Europe, Africa, and Asia. The differentiated proprietary technology stack features dynamic routing of high capacity vehicles allowing unprecedented vehicle utilization and earnings levels for drivers and massively reduced walk to station distances and prices for riders.

With a track record of exponential growth, Swvl achieved annual gross revenue growth of 430% over the past four years. More than 2 million riders to date have booked more than 75 million rides with more than 20 thousand drivers on Swvl’s platform. TaaS offerings have grown gross revenue per client by 4x with > 100% revenue retention over the past two years. Swvl has undergone rapid geographic expansion, including a launch into Europe and Latin America one year ahead of schedule through the recent acquisitions of Shotl and Viapool.

Swvl recently entered into a business combination with Queen’s Gambit Growth Capital. Implied, fully diluted equity value is $1.5bn, including an upsized PIPE of $122.5m, of which $65.5mn has been pre-funded to accelerate the company’s growth plans. Swvl is the first $1bn+ unicorn from the region to list on NASDAQ and the first mass transit solutions company on any exchange. The PIPE was led by strategic and financial investors, including Agility, Luxor Capital, Zain, EBRD, and Chimera.

Founded on strong ESG principles, Swvl advances social and economic equity while reducing more than 15 million person-hours congestion. Since its inception, the platform has prevented more than 250 million pounds of Co2 emissions.",Mobility OS for Smarter Cities,171567.0,https://www.swvl.com/,https://swvl.com,Dubai,"One Central Dubai - United Arab Emirates, Dubai, AE",,"Technology, Information and Internet",201-500 employees,,2017.0,17895012.0,17895012,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/17895012/,760.0,Swvl,https://www.linkedin.com/company/17895012/,2023-05-05T05:09:13.374Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/swvl/,,,

Expandium (a VIAVI Solutions company),https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEyWIu3vORH0Q/company-logo_200_200/0/1538665238745?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=44dG239nU5ZuItauz-9Na25MFmTFpjXNkY-QJUfw3k0,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E1BAQFziGjog_TZMw/company-background_10000/0/1593091135957?e=1683871200&v=beta&t=-ymztWmlqVqCvfJZ_YY3Y63VBx_d81KUHFQdqZv4Op8,"Expandium, a VIAVI Solutions company, is an innovative and leading provider of critical network monitoring solutions that uses the latest big data technologies, enhanced with machine learning and AI.

Since its establishment in 2005, our company has provided public and railway operators with the latest generation of tools to build network intelligence, ranging from troubleshooting to optimization through Customer Experience Management (CEM) and Service Quality Management (SQM).
Our solutions monitor all railway standards: GSM-R, ETCS and the upcoming FRMCS.

Freelancer,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGLHSQIn0jFNA/company-logo_200_200/0/1519902304041?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=H7KEYsFKBqt15yvV6zLXdE9XKbKovbuADD5vQqBwZSI,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D1BAQHFEZKh1jWIUg/company-background_10000/0/1519798071665?e=1683871200&v=beta&t=ts-W-ydwAweQBHp5aFDv0lmYnQmm9nCYjfnfLyM9s3s,"A freelancer or freelance worker is a term commonly used for a person who is self-employed and is not necessarily committed to a particular employer long-term. Freelance workers are sometimes represented by a company or a temporary agency that resells freelance labor to clients; others work independently or use professional associations or websites to get work.

While the term ""independent contractor"" would be used in a higher register of English to designate the tax and employment class of this type of worker, the term freelancing is most common in culture and creative industries and this term specifically motions to participation therein.

Fields, professions and industries where freelancing is predominant include music, writing, acting, computer programming, web design, translating and illustrating, and other forms of piece work which some cultural theorists consider as central to the cognitive-cultural economy.",,53050.0,https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freelancer,https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freelancer,,,,Media Production,"10,001+ employees",,,18075742.0,18075742,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/18075742/,10572.0,Freelancer,https://www.linkedin.com/company/18075742/,2023-05-05T05:25:30.339Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/freelancerj/,"Journalism, Media, newspaper, and Communication",,

ICPC - International Collegiate Programming Contest,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEuSay7CdclIg/company-logo_200_200/0/1536603758181?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=Tg60upX_1VPhDWhCbhH4ugz0qZW4LLi_7tK48LZ2tRg,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E1BAQE4i52h-0lvww/company-background_10000/0/1612620601063?e=1683871200&v=beta&t=IfxU-RKLw3fiUpgN9sKyh9XIJm5g-0t3tDM_vCtcoDQ,"The ICPC is affiliated with the ICPC Foundation.  Operating with the auspices of the ICPC Foundation and headquartered at Baylor University, the ICPC Community is a global volunteer community of faculty, students, and professionals operating on six continents at 3,000 universities that annual conduct the International Collegiate Programming Contest.

The ICPC is an academically credentialed competition among the universities of the world.  Joining with industry and community, the ICPC seeks to raise performance and aspirations of the most gifted problem solvers in the computing sciences by instilling habits of excellence in the next generation of problem solvers.

Established in 1970 with the auspices of UPE which continue to this day, the first finals held in 1977.  The competition is sometimes referred to as the ICPC Battle of the Brains and the Olympics of Competitive Programming.

The ICPC is the historical root of all programming competitions.",Creating opportunity for the world's greatest collegiate problem solvers.,20620.0,http://icpc.global,icpc.global,Waco,"Baylor University, One Bear Place, #97356, Waco, TX 76798, US",,Higher Education,11-50 employees,"Waco, TX",1970.0,857208.0,857208,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/857208/,255.0,ICPC - International Collegiate Programming Contest,https://www.linkedin.com/company/857208/,2023-05-05T05:40:44.296Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/icpc-international-collegiate-programming-contest/,"competitive learning, collaborative learning, extreme gaming, programming contest, competitive programming, sports programming, higher education, and computer science",,

The British University in Egypt,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQEnNUe8hEFRuw/company-logo_200_200/0/1663660699089?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=v3q92odCsl71XDxIYuLZA5cd0ckmsgLV-3so4mdcZYw,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D1BAQGSA3omPasJXw/company-background_10000/0/1660483384527?e=1683889200&v=beta&t=-i8v7V6lTvyu5P81viITISJnbxaK1DcWAv5it16qT54,"Since 1998, one ambition was set by the British and the Egyptian governments, that ambition was the formation of the British University in Egypt (BUE) that could produce graduates of UK standards to enter key sectors of the Egyptian economy. A group of UK universities provide the academic direction, teaching and quality management processes thereby ensuring the 'British' quality of the education.

fwd is an 18-month scholarship program aiming at doubling the capacity of professional Egyptians active in remote tech work and at maximizing Egypt’s global competitiveness and ICT services exports. fwd targets upskilling 100 thousand Egyptians through Udacity online learning platform in 3 technology specializations Web, Data, and Digital Marketing, as well as, sharpening their online portfolios and skills in remote work successful acquisition and delivery. SAIP - Saudi Authority for Intellectual Property,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHvFwuRTSzghw/company-logo_200_200/0/1632998214589?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=pI91Bhv3mphg3MASrdGL7Xebe4LuBXCuXgdEjEqR73I,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D1BAQFeWTl37Ecu5Q/company-background_10000/0/1682407879990?e=1683892800&v=beta&t=9wpSQUe3lQBuPzfwxpOrMcN_Sxsxk1uqENxGdJaFl_s,"الهيئة السعودية للملكية الفكرية هي منظمة حكومية ترتبط تنظيمياً برئيس مجلس الوزراء، أنشئت بموجب القرار الوزاري رقم ٤١٠ بتاريخ

يقع مقر الهيئة الرئيسي بمدينة الرياض، تهدف الهيئة إلى تنظيم مجالات الملكية الفكرية في المملكة العربية السعودية ودعمها وتنميتها ورعايتها واحترامها وإنفاذها والارتقاء بها وفقاً لأفضل الممارسات العالمية.

وتتمثل رؤية الهيئـة السـعودية للملكية الفكرية فـي أن تكـون هيئــــة متكاملــــة للملكيــــة الفكريــة ذات اعتبــار عــالمي، ومحوراً رئيسياً للملكيــــة الفكريــة فــي منطقــة الشــرق الأوسط وشمال أفريقيا.

Saudi Authority for Intellectual Property (SAIP), is a governmental organization and it is organizationally linked to the Prime Minister according to the Ministerial Resolution No.410 dated 28/6/1438 AH. The Headquarters of SAIP is located in Riyadh. The Saudi Authority of Intellectual Property aims to organize, support, sponsor, protect and promote intellectual property in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia in accordance with international best practices. SAIP’s vision is to be a globally respected IP authority and establish itself as the IP hub in MENA.

General Organization for Social Insurance,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEHH0Y1NPj-IQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1658394905260?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=QlG1Mp5WMv0M7Ev3K6cRbJTWDcUyVzMAezA7siUjmjc,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E1BAQFt8Om4eHZy6A/company-background_10000/0/1658399072025?e=1683892800&v=beta&t=53lhaFqxnNpu9pFxVviV30yQst5dj-vP7cRUV0vK0RM,"تعتبر المؤسسة العامة للتأمينات الاجتماعية من المؤسسات ذات الشخصية الاعتبارية والاستقلال المالي والإداري التي توفر الحماية الاجتماعية والمظلة التأمينية في المملكة العربية السعودية وتغطي موظفي الدولة المدنيين والعسكريين والعاملين في القطاع الخاص والعاملين على بند الأجور في القطاع الحكومي، وتقوم على تنفيذ نظام التأمينات الاجتماعية وفروعه ولوائحه التنفيذية ونظامي التقاعد المدني والعسكري بالمملكة العربية السعودية وفقاً للأنظمة والترتيبات التنظيمية الصادرة بهذا الشأن. والتي تطبق بشكل إلزامي على جميع العسكريين والموظفين السعوديين المدنيين المعينين على مراتب في ميزانيات الدولة وميزانيات الهيئات العامة وعلى جميع العمال السعوديين العاملين في منشآت في القطاع الخاص بالمملكة، ويطبق بشكل اختياري على العاملين لحسابهم الخاص. وتقوم المؤسسة أيضاً بخدمة المستفيدين من نظامي تبادل المنافع ونظام مد الحماية التأمينية لمواطني دول مجلس التعاون.

حيث صدر قرار مجلس الوزراء رقم (657) وتاريخ 05/11/1442هــ القاضي بدمج ""المؤسسة العامة للتقاعد"" في ""المؤسسة العامة للتأمينات الاجتماعية"" وفق الترتيبات الواردة بموجبه بما في ذلك تحل المؤسسة العامة للتأمينات الاجتماعية محل المؤسسة العامة للتقاعد، في جميع ما لها من مسؤوليات وصلاحيات وحقوق والتزامات ونحوها، وتنقل إليها جميع أصول المؤسسة العامة للتقاعد بكافة أنواعها. وذلك بهدف توحيد العمل بما يحقق البيئة المناسبة والطريقة اللازمة للوصول إلى التطبيق الأمثل لأنظمة التأمينات والتقاعد  وتنمية مواردها بما يتلاءم مع طبيعتها ونطاق التزاماتها الحالية والمستقبلية وبما ينعكس أثره إيجاباً على عملائها.

وتهدف أنظمة التقاعد والتأمينات الاجتماعية في المملكة لتوفير الحياة الكريمة للمتقاعدين وأسرهم بعد تركهم العمل بسبب التقاعد أو العجز أو الوفاة، كما يوفر النظام العناية الطبية والتعويضات اللازمة في حالات إصابات العمل أو العجز المهني. من خلال فرع الأخطار المهنية والذي يطبق بصورة إلزامية على جميع العاملين في سوق العمل السعودي من السعوديين وغير السعوديين كما يوفر النظام الرعاية للعامل السعودي الذي ترك العمل لظروف خارجة عن إرادته من خلال صرف تعويض (ساند)، التدريب، البحث عن عمل..",المؤسسة العامة للتأمينات الاجتماعية,3173.0,https://www.gosi.gov.sa/GOSIOnline/landing,https://gosi.gov.sa/GOSIOnline/landing,حي المربع,"شارع الوشم, حي المربع, الرياض 12613, SA",,Insurance,"1,001-5,000 employees","حي المربع, الرياض",1958.0,658430.0,658430,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/658430/,95.0,General Organization for Social Insurance,https://www.linkedin.com/company/658430/,2023-05-05T11:03:46.650Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/general-organization-for-social-insurance1/,,,

PostgreSQL Global Development Group,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFFMOa_esdRQQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1519889726936?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=v8TwiU-z5Xo84OPLQOwIujSBnUKDKqMtfWu0NSE2LoA,,"PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system. It has more than 15 years of active development and a proven architecture that has earned it a strong reputation for reliability, data integrity, and correctness. It runs on all major operating systems, including Linux, UNIX (AIX, BSD, HP-UX, SGI IRIX, Mac OS X, Solaris, Tru64), and Windows. It is fully ACID compliant, has full support for foreign keys, joins, views, triggers, and stored procedures (in multiple languages). It includes most SQL:2008 data types, including INTEGER, NUMERIC, BOOLEAN, CHAR, VARCHAR, DATE, INTERVAL, and TIMESTAMP. It also supports storage of binary large objects, including pictures, sounds, or video. It has native programming interfaces for C/C++, Java, .Net, Perl, Python, Ruby, Tcl, ODBC, among others, and exceptional documentation.

An enterprise class database, PostgreSQL boasts sophisticated features such as Multi-Version Concurrency Control (MVCC), point in time recovery, tablespaces, asynchronous replication, nested transactions (savepoints), online/hot backups, a sophisticated query planner/optimizer, and write ahead logging for fault tolerance. It supports international character sets, multibyte character encodings, Unicode, and it is locale-aware for sorting, case-sensitivity, and formatting. It is highly scalable both in the sheer quantity of data it can manage and in the number of concurrent users it can accommodate. There are active PostgreSQL systems in production environments that manage in excess of 4 terabytes of data.",The World's Most Advanced Open Source Relational Database,13538.0,https://www.postgresql.org/,https://postgresql.org,,US,,IT Services and IT Consulting,51-200 employees,,,758353.0,758353,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/758353/,69.0,PostgreSQL Global Development Group,https://www.linkedin.com/company/758353/,2023-05-05T11:04:12.655Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/postgresql-global-development-group/,,,

ITG was founded in 1989 and currently operates in five branches; ITG Jordan, ITG America, ITG Saudi, ITG Egypt, ITG Africa, and ITG Asia.

With a family consisting of over 300 subject matter experts disseminated across three subsidiaries: ITG Solutions, JAID Productions, and ITG Fund. For over 33 years, it has been one of the most successful IT companies, offering quality end-to-end products and services to the education and public sectors in many countries around the world.

ITG innovations come first but not last to the development of the first Arabic Artificial Intelligence Parser, the creation of an Electronic Data Interchange solution, EduWave®, one of the top education solutions, with more than 25 million users, and 50,000 educational institutions. ITG also offers WaveGRP® and WaveERP® solutions that automate and streamline all aspects of operations performed in both governmental and private sectors. ITG invests 7% of its revenue in R&D to stay ahead of customers' growing demands and win the race to meet their expectations within ever-changing digital environment.

Professional training, along with social initiatives, is an ongoing effort at ITG so employees can stay well-informed with regard to the technological advancements, and methods that assist them in developing reliable, scalable, and robust solutions. ITG embraces fresh graduates, fortifying their potential energies towards further development.

At ITG we believe that our long-lasting relationships with clients stem from quality, honesty, accountability, and commitment to provide them with the highest quality integrated solutions and services, thus empowering people while assisting organizations in achieving business growth.

We’re committed to constant improvement with a relentless focus on developing premises, processes and people. In the way we operate, as well as our impact on the environment, we strive to meet the expectations of the most progressive global clients.
Quality:

Scitra’s vision is “To be the best choice provider of manufacturing services to our customers in the technologies we choose to operate”. This is a direction in which we’re already heading. Fully committed to international best practices, we have been ISO 9001:2000 certified for more than 15 years. All our plants are certified or undergoing certification for Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) – ISO 22716. We also have Saudi Arabian Standards Organization (SASO) certification.

To maintain our stringent standards, all plants are connected to our main laboratory where regular quality-related product checks are carried out.As support, all plants also have an onsite laboratory to manage immediate checks according to our own standards or the requirements of our customers.
People And Environment

The safety of our people and the environment are also top priorities. We have achieved OSHAS 18001 Certificate – the highest certification for Occupational Health and Safety, and are in the process of achieving ISO 14000 – effective Environmental Management System (EMS).
Additional Services

In addition to contract manufacturing, we provide a full range of packaging options onsite. These include promotional co-packaging as well as a multitude of special packaging options – from stickers to shrink-wrap – to help our clients’ brands perform better on the shelf.

Now, it is also considered the largest, serving more than 2.7 million users with secure, accessible and easy solutions that meet their day-to-day financial needs.

Being available at over 300,000 points of sale for credible and approachable vendors spread across every country and city within the region, CASHU has made it easy for consumers to top-up their CASHU digital wallets and pay online, whether from merchants that accept CASHU directly as a payment method or on millions of websites that accept credit card payments.

CASHU is currently accepted by over 7,000 online merchants around the globe. We’ve given them the chance to offer their products and services to millions of buyers residing in this raw region, especially those who are unbanked with no access to financial institutions, and so grow their businesses and expand smoothly and securely.
Our Vision: A Cashless Society through CASHU
To lead the world to a cashless lifestyle, where your wallet becomes a digital extension of yourself.
Our Mission: Ultimate Mobilization

Air Liquide,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQF6PhVyWbLl5Q/company-logo_200_200/0/1519855871355?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=i4843Jn-H2b95aOw-dTcKX5uRmVIvpyd27EX4ZSG2cg,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E1BAQEdrAyR9m93fQ/company-background_10000/0/1664977902974?e=1683896400&v=beta&t=AaDAzmfd1VV4Eg4LNqV1ZHREzk957hzm2-ovYBxJT2I,"A world leader in gases, technologies and services for Industry and Health, Air Liquide is present in 73 countries with approximately 67,100 employees and serves more than 3.9 million customers and patients. Oxygen, nitrogen and hydrogen are essential small molecules for life, matter and energy. They embody Air Liquide’s scientific territory and have been at the core of the company’s activities since its creation in 1902.

Taking action today while preparing the future is at the heart of Air Liquide’s strategy. With ADVANCE, its strategic plan for 2025, Air Liquide is targeting a global performance, combining financial and extra-financial dimensions. Positioned on new markets, the Group benefits from major assets such as its business model combining resilience and strength, its ability to innovate and its technological expertise. The Group develops solutions contributing to climate and the energy transition—particularly with hydrogen—and takes action to progress in areas of healthcare, digital and high technologies.

Air Liquide’s revenue amounted to more than 29.9 billion euros in 2022. Air Liquide is listed on the Euronext Paris stock exchange (compartment A) and belongs to the CAC 40, CAC 40 ESG, EURO STOXX 50, FTSE4Good and DJSI Europe indexes.

Our Mission:

Next Technology Leaders (NTL),https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEhpxwL3Gh1ow/company-logo_200_200/0/1555117207096?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=u86_pXNWYdmM02GNaG6C5N22u918WBihCGvk_7-y6Gs,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D1BAQE9DKzkJ9j8rw/company-background_10000/0/1555117523384?e=1683900000&v=beta&t=MA3rqlv3s9f7SRzwbNzPKS1T7j1T-Wa1heJt9wRDyK4,"About the Initiative

H.E. Mr. President Abdel Fattah ElSisi launched the technology learning initiative “Next Technology Leaders (NTL)” to build the capacity of young calibers on the latest information, communications, and electronics technologies. The Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT) leads to executing the NTL Initiative through the Technology Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center of the Information Technology Industry Development Agency. Capacity building is to be orchestrated through the establishment of integral, practical, high-quality learning ecosystem, centered on the learner and supported by a distinctive content prepared through the collaborative effort of top universities and leading companies and is made available on globally leading MOOC platforms. The ecosystem is inclusive of a nationwide network of study group mentors that coaches learners and stimulate the learning process. A network of project reviewers also assesses and improve learning outcomes.
Objectives
Building capacity and certifying young calibers on the recent advances in communication and information technologies.
Increasing the competitiveness of local ICT companies by facilitating their training and capacity building plans.
Supporting creation of job and business opportunities for the youth through wage employment, freelancing, or startup establishment.
Forming nationwide mentoring and review networks in leading technologies to act as a platform for fostering innovation and entrepreneurship.

column2: Analysis is a leading life sciences company founded in 1999 as a sister company to Clinilab, focusing on the research and forensic analysis sector.

As the representative for Applied Biosystems, one of the foremost life sciences companies in the world, Analysis became the leader in its field in Egypt. In 2011, Applied Biosystems was acquired by Invitrogen followed by the 2014 acquisition by Thermo Scientific, with Analysis proving its ability to sustain and represent this life sciences colossus in Egypt.

Today, Analysis has several sales and marketing departments, including Technology Solutions, Consumables, Lab Products, Quality and Safety, Bio Production, and Cytogenetics. These departments were created with the customer in mind to maximize the focus of our team for the ultimate customer experience.

column1: Our strategy:

column2: In today uncertain business environment, bio-technology is creating big challenges-and even bigger opportunities. Our strategy is to combine our expertise in business, technology & operations strategy with a full understanding of how bio-technology will impact industry & business models to help our clients to make the world healthier, brighter & safer to ensure their scientific success.

CAT""​ Is a team going to be a non-profit foundation concentrated on Computer Science, and IT specially the Open Source technologies.
CAT Goals:
* Building a strong community of Engineers that raise the level of Computer Science and Engineering, and all related to them to compete the first world's countries, and to be superiors.
* Helping Egypt to raise with self-efforts to be on of the manufacturers of information technology in the world.
CAT is going more to serve the community and makes the community serve us to achieve our goals, by spreading advanced and basic education.
This happens by:
* Open source projects have an echo in the world.
* Courses.
* Technical contests.
* Helping in employment.
* Relations with local and global countries for getting fund.
* Different conferences Arab-wide and world wide.
On the humanitarian side,CAT is working through the use of technology to assist in repairing and fixing some problems that exist in Egypt, whether on short term or long term.

Alexandria University,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEERLbGevtwNw/company-logo_200_200/0/1543090424263?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=7GhUnBdMVmQZbf6ftpSvUl3rMRsNteJV3_skoQAVqxk,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E1BAQHMs4qfRvBN0g/company-background_10000/0/1615117214126?e=1683900000&v=beta&t=KOvykdx2dow_0KfBm0HqvP-nfPEQSG-9-a0-CcwqkXc,"In 1938, the nucleus of the Alexandria University (formerly known as Farouk University) had its beginning in the form of two faculties of Fouad the First University. These were the faculties of Arts and Law. The faculty of Engineering was then established in 1941.

In the light of the need for developing more disciplines for higher learning and with a view towards meeting the need of the people of Alexandria, Alexandria University became a separate entity in August 1942 with four additional faculties: Science, Commerce, Medicine and Agriculture.

In 1952, it became ""Alexandria University""​. Since then, the University witnessed growth and expansion in several fields: the number of Faculties and high institutes increased to 22. Some example of them are as follows:
Faculty of Nursing, 1954 (formerly, High Institute of Nursing)
Faculty of Pharmacy, 1956
High Institute of Public Health, 1963
Faculty of Education, 1969
Faculty of Dentistry, 1971
Medical Research Institute, 1971
Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, 1974
Institute of Graduate Studies & Research, 1983
Faculty of Tourism and Hotels, 1983

Alexandria University supervised the establishment of four faculties in the Nile Delta. Those were: Faculty of Medicine (1962) and Faculties of Science (1969) in Tanta (currently Tanta University), Education and Agriculture (1969) in Kafr-Elsheikh (currently Kafr-Elsheikh University).

Seven other Faculties were established in Damanhour, the capital of Behera Governorate: the Faculty of Education (1980), the Faculties of Arts, Agriculture, and Commerce (1983), Science, Veterinary Medicine, and Nursing (2007).( currently Damanhour University)

In 1989, the Faculties and Institute affiliated to Helwan University and located in Alexandria joined the Alexandria University by a Presidential Decree: four Faculties of Physical Education for men, Physical Education for women, fine Arts, and agriculture at Saba-Basha.

CASE reduces the risk companies face in hiring young professionals, helping employers to properly select a candidate according to a reliable long-term performance indicator, rather than raw grades or university reputation. AT Instruments,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEY1v9I0V6l5w/company-logo_200_200/0/1601280974352?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=SWWNnSQ6JwGx2JUX8G5R7hZqcXgvBKtM6XG_ZGXLrXE,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D1BAQEDovwX2xgNGw/company-background_10000/0/1601415920630?e=1683900000&v=beta&t=fjDqOu9eUjgVAzq8hQzH-5l8K3mzbk_PQPpUIjeV568," Providing  a State of the AI solutions to solve the most challenging issues for the Autonomous driving safety and security , Mobility as a service and Fleet management .
1- Cpyr
An AI based Zero time detection for Driver and Car behavior anomalies , serving the fulfillment of the SOTIF safety standard and the prediction of unknown cyber security threats.
CPYR is an AI GPU based technology for Anomaly detection at the Automotive Field.

There are many solutions in the market for securing the Attacking surface but hardly any solution for an AI solution that understands the Car behavior and predicts the anomalies that could be an attack vector not yet defined by any signature based approach.
Cpyr has a submitted paper at SAE Detroit 2021
And striving to file a Patent
Cpyr is targeting customers such as Automotive OEMs and Automotive suppliers
2- Eyedrive
a Mobile cloud solution for live video streaming serving Vehicles , trucks buses at Remote locations.

We used the Deepstream technology along with the Microsoft Azure as our backbone solution plus implementing some AI and Mobile development tech to serve for the Customer user interfacing and Streaming data analytics for Driver and Vehicles detection plus  Vehicle plate recognition
Eyedrive is targeting MaaS (like Ride-hailing services ),  Insurance companies , factories & Companies with huge fleets and individuals (B2C) with the need to follow o

منذ عام 2003 خطا بنك التعمير والاسكان نحو عصر جديد راعياً خطته الاستراتيجية هادفاً ان يكون من ضمن أفضل خمس بنوك في مصر، ليصبح بنك تجاري شامل يتميز بـشكل أساسي في سوق العقارات.

column1: The National Industrial Development and Logistics Program (NIDLP) is one of 13 programs aiming to achieve Saudi Arabia’s 2030 Vision. The program focuses on transforming the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia into a leading industrial  powerhouse and a global logistics hub in promising growth sectors including Industry, Mining, Energy and Logistics. By 2030, the program aims to stimulate private sector investments, generating ample job opportunities for Saudis, enhance the Kingdom's trade balance and maximize local content.
2030 key targets

column2: Stimulate private sector investments by $ 453 Bn.
Increase export and re-export to more than $ 266 Bn.

MSA was established in 1996, and continues to build up on its tradition of providing the Egyptian and Middle Eastern students with the best of British Higher Education since 1996 with the most advanced educational excellence in all disciplines.

MSA was the pioneer in Egypt to validate its programmes with British Universities in 2002. MSA University is the first university granting its graduates a dual-origin bachelor degree; namely a British degree from Bedfordshire or Greenwich universities, and another Egyptian degree which is accredited by the Egyptian Supreme Council for Universities. Thus, MSA University graduates enjoy the privilege of attaining scholarships and have the chance to pursue their MA and PhD studies in the United Kingdom. MSA University is not only known for its quality of education, but also for its magnificent state- of- the- art campus which is built in the middle of the 6th October City on an area of 50 feddans (210,000 m2). You will enjoy walking through the greenery spreading around the campus and the spacious gardens, courtyards, the fresh clean air and the healthy environment. The serenity of the place helps the students to study or to socialize in a warm and really cozy atmosphere.

MSA University is best known for its academic excellence both in the Middle East and internationally, with stronger than ever quality courses and teaching staff.",The best of the Higher Education in Egypt. ICCC A/S (Closed),https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH4ZT5XP3cgyg/company-logo_200_200/0/1519857042429?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=uqVGwqdLtJrRBH50wYISvDbvLMMDyH1RB2TnDJyLjWg,,"HISTORICAL.
The company was closed in June 2016.
Mostly due to the loss of a highly valued customer who shut down a large project, with which ICCC A/S had been deeply involved for more than 25 years.
That said, this was expected a few years ahead, but various attempts to establish a new customer base did unfortunately fail.

A promising partnership with LivePerson, to be their agent in the Nordic countries (Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Iceland and Greenland, was established too late to generate the necessary turnover. ICCC A/S delivered “LiveEngage”, LivePerson’s leading cloud-based customer engagement solution.
A brief outline of the company’s history.

ICCC A/S was founded in 1982 by a group of highly skilled and experienced computer consultants. The focus was in the areas of data- and telecommunication, wired as well as wireless networks based upon the companys multi-host access system UNA® (Universal Network Access). The keyword in the UNA-system is connectivity between different networking environments. ICCC A/S was both a software and hardware development house specialized in data communication, integration of data, telephony and complex system specification.
Over the years ICCC A/S delivered various products to several customers, too many to cover here.
But you may use the Internet Wayback Machine to dig into the companys old websites, which provides more information. https://web.archive.org/web/*/iccc.dk

The company went through one reconstruction in 2004 and one bankruptcy in 2009. From 2009, until the bankruptcy in 2016, it was (formally) a new company, investors being 2 former employees and 1 external. Some of the previous employees stayed with the new company, securing a flow of knowledge.

In November 2015, Al Ahli Bank of Kuwait (ABK) acquired Piraeus Bank Egypt as part of its plans to expand its regional presence, reinforce the Bank competitive position and provide additional value to clients and stakeholders.

Al Ahli Bank of Kuwait (ABK) was established in Kuwait in 1967 on a foundation of extraordinary capabilities and expertise joined to provide superior financial solutions to its clients. Today, ABK offers a full range of products and services and a wide geographical presence in Kuwait, UAE, and Egypt demonstrating its commitment to best serve customer financial needs whilst offering a distinguished banking experience.

ABK-Egypt head office is located in Smart Village, Giza and has presence in most of Egyptian Governorates through its network of 44 branches, 92 ATMs and around 1.000 employees. ABK - Egypt branches are geographically distributed to best serve our Retail, Corporate, and Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) customers through a portfolio of financial products, easy and friendly banking services as well as a wide range of diversified commercial and investments products that are designed to further enhance customers banking experience and satisfy all their financial needs.

Banque du Caire,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHpsFZCu9Evsw/company-logo_200_200/0/1559213367740?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=2audXmluPdfVKsjbDmiY3eTeut01Cgx83-FVQdg6h6k,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D1BAQHntM5THFBKyQ/company-background_10000/0/1559213349418?e=1683903600&v=beta&t=Cgk8H93VbO1x86Uqb3USMCK0u2KwpUQbt1-49ZxHpNs,"Founded in 1952, Banque du Caire is one of Egypt’s oldest and largest banks, a multi-award winning, full-service bank that provides a complete array of products & services to the retail and corporate markets. Offering clients a full suite of personalized retail and corporate banking products & services, the bank has been able to leverage its extensive distribution network spanning the entirety of Egypt. It is renowned in the market for pioneering an institutionalized micro-finance operation, spearheading a push for financial inclusion, community development, and entrepreneurial empowerment long before others in the industry. Its long-standing presence in the Egyptian market has seen it back economic growth for decades.

The bank continues to grow and evolve as part and parcel of its strategy to adapt dynamically to market shifts & customer needs by adding new products and more services to its already vast array of financial solutions in the retail and corporate segments. In 2018, to complement its corporate banking activities and benefit from synergies across its activities and lines of business, Banque du Caire launched a corporate leasing venture Cairo Leasing Corporation (CLC), which has already positioned itself as a leader in the Egyptian leasing sector. BdC also offers exclusive access to COMESA markets through its Ugandan subsidiary, Cairo International Bank (CIB) Uganda.

In today’s digital-centric world, BdC has implemented online banking services offering features that conduct customers to manage transactions with great ease through the website and mobile banking application as well as the Qahera Cash wallet.

We empower therapists to deliver personalized content, using supervised sessions, and to track the impact of the therapy plan/program in light of the short-term and the long-term progress achieved by the users/children. Our content is science-backed, and delivered under the supervision of experienced physicians and therapists.
VRapeutic offers its services through public hospitals, rehabilitation centers, and private clinics. We aim at:

1. Realizing the latest research advances in the field of VR-based healthcare. This will take the form of therapeutic VR content, designed and developed through collaborations with medical and healthcare entities.
2. Developing personalized VR-based therapeutic solutions, guided by therapists and physicians.
3. Leading a research movement, from Canada's Capital, that aims at contributing to this evolving field through publishing research articles in distinguished international conferences.

VRapeutic is a UNICEF Innovation Fund portfolio company since June 2020, and an alumna of FLat6Labs Cairo and Invest Ottawa's pre-Accelerator Program. Banque Misr,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEe85soK1ffIQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1658047966369?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=xEWHf6j-bRAxoFQmD7R379iogCN7VvIf6Zutq0qKRoE,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D1BAQHu8RmuShaUaw/company-background_10000/0/1673769707554?e=1683903600&v=beta&t=32fvUZs1Dfv_vQex4bLjClSWzqm-tcr3yDvd0XuYR0I,"Banque Misr was established in 1920 by the pioneer economist Mohamed Talaat Harb Pasha, who came up with the concept of investing national saving and directing them towards economic and social development and thus Banque Misr became the first bank to be wholly owned by Egyptians.

Since 1920, Banque Misr has been concerned with the establishment of companies in various fields, including spinning and weaving, insurance, transportation, aviation and cinema, and has continued to support all its activities at a steady rate, Banque Misr currently owns equity in 163 projects including financial, industrial, tourism, housing, Agri and food, general service, in addition to projects in the field of communication and information.

Banque Misr has also established major investment funds in Egypt as a part of a diversified portfolio, and has been granted an award by the Global Finance Treasury and Cash Management Awards, as the ""Best Provider of Money Market Funds in Africa and the Middle East for the year 2009 and 2010""​, and ""Best Provider of Money Market Funds in the Middle East for the year 2008, 2012, 2013 and 2014""​, and ""Best provider of Money Market funds and short- term investments in the Middle East for the year 2015,2016 and 2017""​.

A true pioneer in the region, Banque Misr became the first bank in Egypt and North Africa to become compliant with PCI data security standards, upon obtaining the global Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) certification. Utilizing the latest technology in the banking sector, Banque Misr is constantly looking to expand customer access to banking services. Today, Banque Misr is proud to offer one of Egypt's largest ATM networks, located across all areas of Egypt.

Banque Misr's role is evident in all economic fields due to its geographic outreach. The bank's 14110 employees serve a large client base of more than 6.8 million clients in Egypt and a total paid-up capital amounting to EGP 15 billion.

The Bank currently owns and operates more than 580 electronically connected local branches, including 5 branches in the United Arab Emirates, one in France, in addition to regional and global existence in Lebanon, Germany and worldwide network of correspondents.",,497639.0,http://www.banquemisr.com,banquemisr.com,Cairo,"151 Mohamed Farid st.,Cairo  Egypt, Call Center 19888, Cairo,   EG",,Banking,"10,001+ employees",,1920.0,573828.0,573828,https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/573828/,12038.0,Banque Misr,https://www.linkedin.com/company/573828/,2023-05-05T14:57:15.064Z,https://www.linkedin.com/company/banque-misr/,"Commercial Banking, Financial services, and banking",,

Pleny,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFbGOR6N882FQ/company-logo_200_200/0/1681199731071?e=1691625600&v=beta&t=zhYKhjtX6BzZyd0Yy-yOMp1_yyKhGP2RSS4FlT2gfO0,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D561BAQHXBSAYnzBlzw/company-background_10000/0/1681200208283?e=1683903600&v=beta&t=zf1y63WYVyoyjWB40lMcTiiMk2l9zhE7AiyPkn-08us,"What is Pleny

Pleny is the ultimate social network for foodies. By tapping into the power of food to bring people together, Pleny has created a space for people to discover, engage, and connect with each other on a deeper level! We noticed a gap in the food market and we couldn’t help but fill it.

With a one-stop-shop for all things food related from connecting with foodies and food bloggers, discovering new dishes and restaurants, to an easy ordering system and personalized food experience, Pleny has got it all.

That's why Pleny isn't just a food app - it's more of a community where foodies can come together and share their love for food in the most entertaining and trendy way possible. We’re Pleny and we’re here to disrupt the food industry with a social and powerful impact.
Pleny: Empowering Foodies to Connect, Discover, Order and Share!
What can I do on this app
- Be a part of a world of foodies where you can share, comment, tag your friends on food recipes, memes, restaurants and have much more fun.
- Stay in the loop with the latest updates from the food bloggers and connect with them.
- Discover what your friends have ordered and loved (so you'll never again fall for a bad meal ordering experience.
- Build your own community where you can share your love for food with dynamic videos, GIFs, and engaging content.
- Discover new and exciting recipes and cuisines to try.
- Explore a wide variety of restaurants that are top-rated and new.
- Order food with ease and have it delivered to your doorstep.
- Get trusted recommendations on food and restaurants from people you know.
- You can share, comment, reply, and take photos of your food on the feed, allowing people to interact with you.
What problems are we striving to solve

Why waste time switching between apps when you can have it all in one place? From connecting with other food lovers to discovering yummy recipes and top restaurants to ordering food- we’ve got you covered!",Pleny is the ultimate social network for foodies.
